name: Hela
description: Hela, goddess of death and queen of the netherworld, rules the souls of the dead and the order of the realm below.

skills.name: Decay of All
skills.description: Hela shoots Nether Fireballs at the 3 nearest enemies on the field, each dealing DMG equal to 250% of ATK. The fireballs explode to deal DMG equal to 150% of ATK to surrounding enemies.

upgrades.level2: Increases the DMG of each Nether Fireball to 280% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases the explosion DMG of each Nether Fireball to 200% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Hela shoots an extra Nether Fireball.

skills.name: Blight upon Life
skills.description: Hela steals Energy from a random enemy, draining 30 Energy every 0.5s for 2s.

upgrades.level2: Steals HP equal to 50% of ATK from the target every 0.5s.
upgrades.level3: Reduces DMG taken by 50% during the skill.
upgrades.level4: Steals 50 Energy from the target every 0.5s.

skills.name: Devour the Dead
skills.description: A unit falls on the battlefield restores 100 Energy to Hela. This effect has a 0.5s CD.

upgrades.level2: Absorbs 10% of the fallen unit's ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK absorbed to 20%. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Prey on the Weak
skills.description: Hela deals 240% ATK as DMG to the weakest enemy. Defeating the target grants another cast.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 260% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Gains 20% bonus DMG per cast (stacking). (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Defile the Sacred
relic.description: When Soul Devourer triggers, it detonates the fallen's soul, dealing DMG equal to 160% of ATK to targets within range. (Unlock at Relic Lv.1)

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG bonus to 200%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Upon exploding, the souls restore Energy to Hela equal to the Energy restored by Soul Devourer. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG bonus to 240%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
